title: How do the millionaire tech entrepreneurs live? - Quora

response.answer_text: Most of the “millionaire tech entrepreneurs” I know live very humbly. None of them have retired early, and only a few I know have flashy or stereotypical things you might think of. A couple I know made their money fast and early (when they were in their late teens/early 20s). Most of them blew their money on cars and “status” crap to impress friends or others (private flights, etc.)…and those people are working a regular tech job now. Such a shame. The majority I know have a very nice place but not excessive (bought a condo, home, etc..) but have pretty normal lives - they just splurge on fun things (flying to a special Yankee game, travel, maybe a nice boat or car they wanted, etc..), and use their income primarily for future ventures or investments. They dress normally, eat at normal places, and live a life pretty indistinguishable from any other person you might see on the street. It’s the rare exception that lives “big,” and sustains it. The people I have met who really live *big* are hedge fund or finance guys…they often make far more money - but media, for some reason, doesn’t focus on those guys at all.

You are in LUCK!! I am a millionaire tech entrepreneur :). My tech company is worth millions of dollars. However, I live a very standard life. I pay myself less than what other people in my position would get paid and invest most of the excess money we generate back into the company. I would imagine the majority of millionaire tech guys live very similar to me. You are probably wanting to know how the mega millionaires live and I am not qualified to answer that question :)
